title: 02/11/22 DPS Hour 3 Drew Brees and Ed Orgeron
itunes:title: 02/11/22 DPS Hour 3 Drew Brees and Ed Orgeron
description:
Dan Patrick is joined by retired Saints QB & NBC NFL Analyst Drew Brees to talk about his Super Bowl experience, and former LSU head coach Ed Orgeron joins to talk about Joe Burrow, Ja'Marr Chase, and some of his best recruiting stories!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
